com.l8smartlight.sdk.android.bluetooth

Class BluetoothClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.l8smartlight.sdk.android.bluetooth.BluetoothClient

  • public class BluetoothClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class does all the work for setting up and managing Bluetooth connections with other devices. It has a thread for connecting with a device, and a thread for performing data transmissions when connected.

        public void connect(BluetoothDevice device,
           boolean secure)
        Start the ConnectThread to initiate a connection to a remote device.
        Parameters:
        device - The BluetoothDevice to connect
        secure - Socket Security type - Secure (true) , Insecure (false)

             BluetoothDevice device,
             java.lang.String socketType)
        Start the ConnectedThread to begin managing a Bluetooth connection
        Parameters:
        socket - The BluetoothSocket on which the connection was made
        device - The BluetoothDevice that has been connected
